name: Sky Racket - Open beta
description:
Open Beta

Right now we are testing and tweaking the game! This is the page where you will download the game, we're discussing feedback and posting news on our Discord server! 

Click here to join! See you there!

----------------------------------------------------------------

Flying over fancy worlds and skies filled with vivid colors. It’s just you, a stylish scarf, a laser tennis racket, and a horde of cuddly foes trying to blow you back down.

             Mixing the classic genres of Shoot’em ups and Block Breakers, RacketBoy is probably the first Shmup Breaker in the world!

             Play as RacketBoy or RacketGirl, guardians chosen by the Goddess to save your galaxy from the hands of a destructive tyrant genius.

             Unable to attack on its own, you must return the shots of your enemies, turning the battlefield into an explosive game of space tennis. Hustle your way through hordes of ducks, cats that are also sandwiches, cuddly bunnies, professional robot-tennis players, and even live bananas in this unique and unique space adventure to save the galaxy!
